attributes.review:
I don’t think this app has any purpose at all, other than to make pedophiles, rapists, and racist feel they have a “safe space” I’m sorry for anyone who put time and work into building this app but it’s a complete piece of garbage.

💫💘✨Donald and his supports can kiss my a s s🧚‍♀️✨😍

My first time I clicked on the app I got showed more than 40 pictures of Donald’s n00ds and if you think that’s a lot then there were the 40+ rabe allegations against him and then there were pictures of the children he rabed all surrounded by money, but crying. 

Donald is the worst human being alive, but he does not deserve to die, he deserves to      ✨🧚‍♀️💘S U F F E R😍💫🧚🏾‍♂️
attributes.title: No thank you😳🤮🤢

attributes.review: this app turned my phone off even though it was fully charged. cant even open it without being kicked out instantly. had to wipe my phone completely to get rid if the app. Goodbye to 5 yrs of photo memories and irreplaceable voicemails from my dead dad saying i love you, how r u? call me back.. already forgetting his voice now
attributes.title: Crashed my phone

attributes.review:
So I came here to support my wonderful president. However once I downloaded the app I KID YOU NOT my all my linked devices in the hose started recording. We ended up having a power shortage. When I tried to sue I was THREATENED. Our president said that 
“The military forces will have to get involved if you don’t comply with our demands” 
Among other things. The next day THE MILITARY WAS AT OUR LITTLE TOWN DOOR WITH GUNS PULLED AT THE CHILDREN. I MAY BE ARRESTED FOR WRITING THIS BUT I WONT BE SILENCED
(Thank you D)
attributes.title: WOULD RATE ZEO SATRS

attributes.review: Tried downloading the app, took forever. Then I start getting a whole bunch of security emails from various accounts or services I have, all login attempts from RUSSIA. A few of my accounts did get hacked but I recovered them before too much damage was done. 100% believe this app downloads malware onto your phone. Safe yourself, don’t download
attributes.title: Bad Experience

attributes.review: The app took nearly 6 hours to download. After that it asked for access to my notifications and location. But additionally it asked for access to my email and my bank account, I accidentally granted access and when I checked my bank account this morning my money was ALL GONE! It was all donated to Trumps campaign 😡😤
attributes.title: Drained my bank account!!!

attributes.review: I was hoping that I could follow updates about Trump, being the proud American man I am. I was ASTONISHED to find that the app was very glitchy and froze every time I clicked on a tab. I had low standards for this app considering Trump didn’t actually take the SAT (understandable, I payed someone too). I thought I could’ve had something to be proud of but I’m afraid not. He will NOT have my vote. #settleforbiden
attributes.title: Not the best.

attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app i was expecting much more from the president of the United States! but as soon as this app finished downloading it’s like i’ve been cursed! as soon as i opened the app i fell down a flight of stairs and broke my left leg and my right arm! then when i tried to open the app again i suddenly choked on my own saliva AND ALMOST DIED. this app is truly a curse.
attributes.title: ONE OF THE WORST APPS EVER!

attributes.review: so this app caused me to throw up. i also cried because i left my pizza in the oven for way to long. the pizza is burnt 😪. and also the dragon is still there, we must watch out for the dragon!!!! APP TAKES UP TON OF SPACE. 🤎🤍📊🔖😂📊📗🔫🩸🧲🧲🩸💣💽⛩🚤🚀☕️🍼🍼🌟🌏🍂🐌🐌🐌🐠👩‍👦👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨🏃🏾‍♀️. i wish i could just rate it a ⭕️. love all of ya’ll. have faith in god 🙂(also the app had the nerve to make my phone smell like cheetos 😡🎃)
attributes.title: i threw up in my mouth 🤢

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app, I think it hacked into my phone????? And started downloading naughty photos of the VP Mike Pence?????? I thought it was a prank but when I opened the app, it immediately started shouting slurs at me and threatening to grab me by the 🙀 I was extremely sad!!! Apple, please take down this scam!!!! I can tell it’s just full of fake news!!!!! I can’t believe this app is allowed on here!!!!!
attributes.title: scared😖

attributes.review:
I download this app and was immediately called a slur and spit at!!! But I thought hey, maybe it gets better.
Let me tell you it did not.
Seconds later the Tump Administration was at my door because I accidentally rolled my eyes at a picture of my president who in the picture looked like an orange loaf of bread left out for a WEEKS and was immediately taking into custody and told to leave the country.
attributes.title: WORST APP TO EVER EXIST!!!
